nodes.text: Tyresi Gurtt was Captain of Bolt and part of the Khuiumin Survivors.

A female Human, Gurtt was a Eyttyrmin Batiiv pirate serving along Jacob Nive. She later became a Colonel and became a crew member of the Invidious after the Second Battle of Xa Fel, under the command of Moff Leonia Tavira. When Corran Horn and a group of Jedi attack the ship, Gurtt was offered immunity with her cooperation.
